subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Robin Lehner made 20 saves in his first N.H.L. start to help the Ottawa Senators snap a six-game winless streak with a 6-4 victory over the host Islanders on Thursday night.
snippet: Robin Lehner made 20 saves in his first N.H.L. start to help the Ottawa Senators snap a six-game winless streak with a 6-4 victory over the host Islanders on Thursday night.
